verses.name: Numbers 34:14
verses.text: For the tribe of the children of Reuben according to the house of their fathers, and the tribe of the children of Gad according to the house of their fathers, have received their inheritance; and half the tribe of Manasseh have received their inheritance:

verses.name: Numbers 34:15
verses.text: The two tribes and the half tribe have received their inheritance on this side Jordan near Jericho eastward, toward the sunrising.

verses.name: Numbers 34:16
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 34:17
verses.text: These are the names of the men which shall divide the land unto you: Eleazar the priest, and Joshua the son of Nun.
